name: Jumper (Nick Grammatico)
description:
Use your ability to teleport to escape the government prison that you have been trapped in

sound was provided from freesound.org and i cut it down so it loops. 

A thanks to the Unity Forums and Docs along with the DePaul CDM Tutoring center for helping me the basics of Unity. I am an awful coder and thanks to their help I learned how to code to where I can now teach the things I did in this game.
